Room.Name: Darkened Cavern
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the darker section of the caverns where the light from above the glacier can't quite penitrate. There is a door to the west. It's
Room.LongDescription: a massive oak door blocking your passage through the cavern. There doesn't appear to be any sort of key that can open this huge door, but the lock looks pretty rusted, and might be easy to pick.
